page.title: 12LLYSFASI AGRIC. COLLEGE.
page.content: Llysfasi College of Agriculture is a very important institute in the area There are about 75 students residing in the hostels. About 200 come to have courses every day. There are about 22 full time lecturers and about 6 part- time lecturers.There are 6 people working in the kitchens of the college. The ages of the students vary from 16 to 25 and they have an opportunity to work on the 750 acres which belong to the college. The Principal of the college is Mr Fredrick Cunningham and the Deputy- Principal is Mr J. Smith Mr Cunningham was appointed Principal in 1983. There are 80 milking cows and 320 other cows. The farm produces 600 litres of milk every day.There are 1470 sheep, 423 pigs and 1490 hens on the farm.
